verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> come down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> key <S%G2807><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> bottomless pit <S%G12><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> chain <S%G254><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G848><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he laid hold on <S%G2902><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dragon, <S%G1404><s%> that old <S%G744><s%> serpent, <S%G3789><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Devil, <S%G1228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Satan, <S%G4567><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bottomless pit, <S%G12><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shut him up, <S%G2808><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> set a seal <S%G4972><s%> upon <S%G1883><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he should deceive <S%G4105><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> more, <S%G2089><s%> till <S%G891><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> should be fulfilled: <S%G5055><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that <S%G5023><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be loosed <S%G3089><s%> a little <S%G3398><s%> season. <S%G5550><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> thrones, <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they sat <S%G2523><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> judgment <S%G2917><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> unto them: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I saw the <S%G3588><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> of them that were beheaded <S%G3990><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> had not <S%G3756><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beast, <S%G2342><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image, <S%G1504><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> had received <S%G2983><s%> his mark <S%G5480><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G848><s%> foreheads, <S%G3359><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G848><s%> hands; <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they lived <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> reigned <S%G936><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> rest <S%G3062><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> lived not again <S%G326><s%> <S%G3756><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> were finished. <S%G5055><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is the <S%G3588><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> resurrection. <S%G386><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> is he that hath <S%G2192><s%> part <S%G3313><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> resurrection: <S%G386><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> such <S%G5130><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> second <S%G1208><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> power, <S%G1849><s%> but <S%G235><s%> they shall be <S%G2071><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall reign <S%G936><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> are expired, <S%G5055><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> shall be loosed <S%G3089><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> prison, <S%G5438><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> shall go out <S%G1831><s%> to deceive <S%G4105><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> quarters <S%G1137><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> Gog <S%G1136><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Magog, <S%G3098><s%> to gather them together <S%G4863><s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> battle: <S%G4171><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> number <S%G706><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> is as <S%G5613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sand <S%G285><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they went up <S%G305><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> breadth <S%G4114><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> compassed the camp of the saints about, <S%G2944><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3925><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beloved <S%G25><s%> city: <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> came down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> devoured <S%G2719><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devil <S%G1228><s%> that deceived <S%G4105><s%> them <S%G846><s%> was cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brimstone, <S%G2303><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beast <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> false prophet <S%G5578><s%> are, and <S%G2532><s%> shall be tormented <S%G928><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> forever and ever <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> throne, <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> him that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> fled away; <S%G5343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there was found <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> for them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> small <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great, <S%G3173><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the books <S%G975><s%> were opened: <S%G455><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> book <S%G975><s%> was opened, <S%G455><s%> which is <S%G3603><s%> the book of life: <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> were judged <S%G2919><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> those things which were written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> books, <S%G975><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to their <S%G848><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>
